scripts.test: mocha --timeout=100000 tests\Integration\test-handler.js && mocha tests\unit\test-GeoSpotManager.js && mocha tests\unit\test-validator.js
scripts.package: npm pack && sam package --output-template packaged.yml --s3-bucket dankrepocode --region us-west-2
scripts.deploy: sam build && npm run package && sam deploy --template-file packaged.yml --region us-west-2 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --stack-name dank-stack
